programmes.show_description: Girl, Internetted: Meg becomes internet famous, leading her and Peter on an adventure as they try to build her following. Elsewhere, Brian and Stewie revel in their new rental car.
Family Guy Lite: After a mishap at work, Peter decides to take his health more seriously and diets with the help of Quagmire, Joe and Cleveland.
Pride Before the Fail: Hayley discovers she is within one credit of graduating college, but tries to fail so she can continue living at home.
Mom Sauce: Steve's life changes when Snot gets rich thanks to his mum selling a new dipping sauce. Elsewhere, Klaus, Stan, Roger and Jeff become mall fashion show models.
Putts-giving: Animated comedy. The Belchers decide to spend a Thanksgiving morning playing mini golf, but the empty course soon becomes a battlefield of emotions for the family.
Comet-y of Errors: Animated comedy. Teddy is uncertain about his love life and destiny and hopes that the return of a comet to the skies will give him a sign from the universe.
Matt Edmondson narrates a funny selection of Guinness World Record attempts, this time featuring the most blowtorches extinguished with the tongue in one minute.

Web of the Dreamweaver: Animated adventures. The gang investigate the mystery of the Dreamweaver, an evil wizard who is causing citizens to destroy the things they love the most.
The Hodag of Horror: Animated adventures. In pursuit of the mythical Hodag beast, the Mystery Inc. gang find something much more valuable - the fourth planispheric disc piece!
Worst in Show: Animated adventure series. When a giant houndbeast attacks an elite dog show, the gang go undercover and enter Scooby in the show in order to solve the mystery.
Mysteries on the Disorient Express: Animated adventure series. Fred is pleasantly surprised to discover a monster mystery on board a mystery-free three-day cross-country train trip.
Garden in the Sky Vancouver: House-hunting show. Estate agent Chantal Vignola takes on the challenge of finding a new Vancouver condominium for her future in-laws Lisa and Blair.
Reality series. Our favourite Essex crew have all headed to Cyprus for some summer sun, but tempers fray and passions boil over with the gang all back together.
Reality series. Amy confronts Joe about his treatment of Harry as the group continue their break in Cyprus, and Elma and Jodie strengthen their bond after confronting Diags.
Reality series. An emotional conversation leaves both Joe and Harry determined to make their relationship work, but a conversation between Joe and Junaid could wreck things yet.
Ryan joins Stephen Mulhern and hopes to be the player who can take a life-changing jackpot home while staying strong against the Banker.
Join Stephen Mulhern as Felix takes to the hot seat hoping to turn the tables and take the Banker for all he's worth.
Uche joins Stephen Mulhern as she opens the famous red boxes in the hope of becoming a jackpot winner and avoiding joining the 1p Club.
Just 33 players remain as Rob Brydon hosts another thrilling edition of quick-fire quiz duels and we learn who will edge closer to victory and the 50,000-pound jackpot.
Firefighting duo Harry and Ben try to cash out with some truly life-changing money before husband-and-wife team Ciaran and Louise try to hold their nerve and avoid crashing out.

programmes.show_name: New: Love Island All Stars: Unseen Bits
programmes.show_description: After a truly unforgettable final week in the Villa, this is your last chance to catch up on all the exclusive unseen action they couldn't squeeze into the show.
Adam West High: Brian's campaign to rename the school after Adam West is successful, and he feels compelled to run for mayor. However, he faces competition from Quagmire.
No Giggity, No Doubt: The guys volunteer to chaperone the high school prom, where Quagmire hits it off with Courtney, only to discover she is in fact his daughter.
Pork 'n Feelings: US animated comedy series. Jeff seeks help from a machine that reveals sexual fantasies, and Bullock goes overboard with a spot of decluttering.
Enter Stanman: Stan becomes worried about the content of Francine's dreams - so Roger teaches him how to enter them, but things quickly go awry.
Strong Women: Documentary series. Olivia explores the earning power of strong women, from a bricklayer who has made a million pounds to a bodybuilder in the US.
Bananae: Sitcom set in ancient Rome. Mass immigration from Thrace puts the boys into contact with a sexy Thracian named Irina and a dazzling yellow exotic fruit called the banana.
Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.
Shopping from home.
Shopping from home.
Art of Darkness: Animated adventures with Scooby and the gang. Crystal Cove welcomes artist Randy Warsaw, whose latest work comes to life and attacks patrons of the museum.
The Gathering Gloom: Animated adventures with Scooby and the gang. The Graveyard Ghoul attacks in the middle of Mayor Nettles' Horror Movie Night, forcing the gang to investigate.
Halloween: Animated adventure series. The gang goes trick or treating on Halloween night, but the experience goes wrong when Fred runs into a witch that he met before 11 years ago.
The Curse of Kaniaku: Animated adventure series. The gang meet an ancient monster and try to solve a 700-year-old mystery while on a trip to Japan to visit a friend of Velma.
Matt Edmondson narrates this series about the most entertaining Guinness World Records and the brilliant characters who set them as captured by TV shows around the globe.
Shock Inside The Box: Single guys Connor, Jamie and Tim compete for the affections of receptionist Lacey - which of the three shoppers' fashion choices will earn them a date?
Reality series. Everyone heads to the beach club to celebrate the last day in Cyprus, but Harry is in no mood to celebrate after learning about Junaid's feelings for Joe.
Reality series. Emotions run high after Harry and Joe call time on their relationship, and Jodie makes it clear that Diags needs to spend more time bonding with her son Bear.
Stephen Mulhern welcomes Asiya to the table as she opens the legendary red boxes and hopes to bag herself a fortune by keeping the reds in play and eliminating the blues.
Join Stephen Mulhern as Mark gets his chance to take on the Banker and finds out if his box contains a life-changing amount of money or the 1p lurking inside.
Stephen Mulhern hosts a celebrity special of the classic game show with Bonnie Langford, Aston Merrygold, and Liza Tarbuck all trying to win a 50,000-pound jackpot for charity.
Graham Norton welcomes firefighter Kerrie, financial advisor Richard, and account manager Ciaran as they tackle tough puzzles and face the Wheel for a chance to win 50,000 pounds.
The show returns with more hopefuls welcomed by the award-winning Ant & Dec before showing their talents to judges Simon Cowell, Amanda Holden, Alesha Dixon and new addition KSI.
More incredible never-before-seen auditions as we meet golden baton twirlers Sunrise Baton, care home worker-turned-magician Craig Roe, and stunning opera singer Emma Nuule.

programmes.show_description: Dirty Business: From distilling worn pants to erotic audio, Olivia seeks out the latest innovators in the booming sex industry looking for the next gap in the market.
